import { Playground } from "docz";
import { Button, Flex, IconButton, ProgressButton, Badge } from "ui";

<Flex direction={"column"}>
  <IconButton icon={"TrashIcon"} variant={"red"}>
    Button
  </IconButton>
  <IconButton icon={"TrashIcon"} variant={"green"}>
    Button
  </IconButton>
  <IconButton icon={"TrashIcon"} variant={"blue"}>
    Button
  </IconButton>
  <IconButton icon={"TrashIcon"} variant={"orange"}>
    Button
  </IconButton>
</Flex>
A button that when clicked or pressed on for an amount of time, will display a visual indicator of progression.

<Playground><Flex direction={"column"}>
    <ProgressButton variant={"red"} progressColor={"blue"}>
        Button
    </ProgressButton>
    <ProgressButton variant={"green"} progressColor={"orange"}>
        Button
    </ProgressButton>
    <ProgressButton variant={"blue"} progressColor={"red"}>
        Button
    </ProgressButton>
    <ProgressButton variant={"orange"} progressColor={"red"} onProgressComplete={() => alert('Do something')}>
        On complete
    </ProgressButton>
</Flex></Playground>
